Tafuta Is the Swahili word for search,Tafuta ID is an application, that helps Search or Submit a lost National ID card into the system.

When Searching for a lost ID Card,simply submit the Card details; Name and ID number, the App will check for any submitted ID Cards.If found it will display the cards current location and provide a way to contact whoever is in possession of the card. In the event its not found the user will be prompted to submit a search Appeal.

To Submit an ID Card,simply provide the Card details,a verification will be conducted and the card will be entered into the system.If a search appeal for that ID Card has been posted,it will display the location of whoever lost of the card and provide a way to contact them. 

Tafuta ID is in accordance with the Registration of Persons Act(Chapter 107)of the Kenyan Constitution.
